issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Types
components.description: Issues related to Hive Query Languages type system

fields.description: tinyint & shortint are currently inferred as ints, if they are without postfix.
fields.summary: Use most specific type for numerical constants

comments.body:
Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12796159/HIVE-13373.1.patch

{color:green}SUCCESS:{color} +1 due to 1 test(s) being added or modified.

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 314 failed/errored test(s), 9891 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
{noformat}
TestSparkCliDriver-groupby3_map.q-sample2.q-auto_join14.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
TestSparkCliDriver-groupby_map_ppr_multi_distinct.q-table_access_keys_stats.q-groupby4_noskew.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
TestSparkCliDriver-join_rc.q-insert1.q-vectorized_rcfile_columnar.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
TestSparkCliDriver-parallel_join0.q-union_remove_9.q-smb_mapjoin_21.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
TestSparkCliDriver-ppd_join4.q-join9.q-ppd_join3.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
